oracle.spatial.spark.vector.geoenrichment

Class GeoJSONSpatialLayerDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.spark.vector.geoenrichment.GeoJSONSpatialLayerDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GeoJSONSpatialLayerDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Describes a spatial data layer. The data layer is expected to be stored in a file and it may be related hierarchically to another spatial data layer.
    The hierarchical relationship that can be described is from a child to a parent layer.
    Author:
    hsaucedo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeoJSONSpatialLayerDescriptor

        public GeoJSONSpatialLayerDescriptor(java.lang.String fileName,
                                     java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new instance
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name of the current layer
        name - the name of the current layer

      • GeoJSONSpatialLayerDescriptor

        public GeoJSONSpatialLayerDescriptor(java.lang.String fileName,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String parentRefField)
        Creates a new instance
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name of the current layer
        name - the name of the current layer
        parentRefField - the name of the field used to associate a feature from this layer to a feature from a parent layer

      • GeoJSONSpatialLayerDescriptor

        public GeoJSONSpatialLayerDescriptor(java.lang.String fileName,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String parentRefField,
                                     java.lang.String parentRedFieldMapping)
        Creates a new instance
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name of the current layer
        name - the name of the current layer
        parentRefField - the name of the field used to associate a feature from this layer to a feature from a parent layer
        parentRedFieldMapping - the name of a field from the parent layer which contains the same value than the field parentRefField from this layer
